post:
Have a spare server just sitting here, so just letting it go for cheap. 

CPU: Dual core Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU  J1800  @ 2.41GHz
Ram: 8GB
Gigabit Network
Location: Canada
Bandwidth: 500GB per month
CentOS 6 
No OS reinstall.

Looking glass: http://lg-tor1.openinternet.ca/
